thread.title: Confirmed: Manchester United sign Gundogan from Nomads
thread.title_full: Confirmed: Manchester United sign Gundogan from Nomads

title: Confirmed: Manchester United sign Gundogan from Nomads
text:
0 Feb 28, 2017 14:09:50 The exciting teenager started his career in midfield before evolving into a more attacking role and will soon link up with the Red Devils 
Manchester United have secured the signing of promising Welsh attacking midfielder Levent Gundogan, his former club have confirmed. 
Ibra is 'running Manchester United's dressing room' 
The Under-14s star, who also doubles up as a striker, has signed a deal to join the Old Trafford club following a successful six-week trial, following two years with Connah's Quay Nomads. 
Gundogan caught the eye of United scouts while playing in a friendly match against one of their age-graded sides, scoring four goals. 
The talented teen was selected by the North Wales development squad earlier in the campaign and is also expected to to break into Wales' Under-16 side in the near future. Manchester United yapılan denemelerin ardından altyapısına Galler'in Connah's Quay takımından 14 yaşındaki Levent Gündoğan'ı transfer etti. pic.twitter.com/UD841D2O2G
